title: exclusive range of VW Splitty/Jack Kerouac inspired T-Shirts

posts.content:
OK, I’ve designed an exclusive range of VW Splitty/Jack Kerouac inspired T-Shirts/stickers etc. that I thought some might like?

They feature a classic quote from Jack Kerouac, an American novelist and poet of French-Canadian heritage. He is considered a literary iconoclast and, alongside William S. Burroughs and Allen Ginsberg, a pioneer of the Beat Generation.

Combined with a distressed looking line drawing of an iconic 1960’s camper that inspired the spirit of adventure and stirred the souls of many generations of travellers ever since.

T-Shirt/Sticker colours are customisable so you can choose a colour to suit, these are just example colours available…



Bumper sticker (or equally cool on your window, toolbox, skateboard, cool box or interior etc.) – colours are customisable so you can choose a colour to suit…



and



Bumper sticker (or equally cool on your window, toolbox, skateboard, cool box or interior etc.) – colours are customisable so you can choose a colour to suit…



These are available online from http://www.vdubxs.com/4-sale/

If you missed out on yesterday's killer deal, don't be disappointed… it's been extended for another day!

So you can still order online from http://www.vdubxs.com/4-sale/

I’ve added to the Jack Kerouac quote inspired range of t-shirts with some new mug designs.

They come in a classic black and white version, or in a reversed white out option which allows you to choose your own personalised colour background at no extra cost. The ‘ringer’ design mug gives you multiple colour choices for the handle and lip. The mugs are dishwasher and microwave safe.

Both designs are also available in a classic black and white distressed line drawing style.





Available online from http://www.vdubxs.com/4-sale/
Today only, 50% off all tshirts! Use the code: DECTSHIRTS14 To order, please go to http://www.vdubxs.com/4-sale/
You can customise them by choosing what colour T-shirt you want…
Upto 50% off the t-shirts and 40% off mugs with the code: BOXINGDAYFUN - njoy http://www.vdubxs.com/4-sale/
plus of course the super cool Schwimmwagen t-shirts are also available…

happy camper – new t-shirt design now available!

Distressed line drawing of a vintage VW split screen camper, available in a range of colours through http://www.vdubxs.com/4-sale/

I have recently been busy designing a small exclusive range of vintage VW camper merchandise based around some line drawings I created of a classic 1960’s VW split screen camper.

From this I have produced a range of cool looking bumper stickers featuring these distressed looking line drawing of an iconic 1960’s camper that inspired the spirit of adventure and stirred the souls of many generations of travellers ever since.

These quality bumper stickers are available in a range of colours that will outlast heavy rain, intense sunlight, and the most severe of traffic jams. These bumper stickers would look on cool on your bumper or even your window, toolbox, skateboard, cool box or interior etc.

  • size 280mm x 75mm (11" x 3")
  • Made from durable vinyl with a strong adhesive back.
  • Printed with water-resistant ink that won’t fade or run.
  • Available in a range of colours to choose from

All stickers are £3.80 each

First up, one for those like me love to be by the sea!



Then a classic quote from Jack Kerouac, an American novelist and poet of French-Canadian heritage. He is considered a literary iconoclast and, alongside William S. Burroughs and Allen Ginsberg, a pioneer of the Beat Generation.



and the classic line you’ve heard when ‘a man in the pub said…’



then one for the traveller and explorer…



and another classic quote from Jack Kerouac…



Anyway, I hope you like them? To order anything, please go to http://www.vdubxs.com/4-sale/

We promise 100% satisfaction – if you don't love it we'll take it back

Follow and support the adventures of our vintage camper by buying this, or some of our other individually designed, retro inspired goodies!
